title: Journey for survival
creator_credit: UNICEF, World Health Organisation, United Nations Development Programme and Dick Young
brief_description: Examines how the provision of safe drinking water to impoverished nations was achieved in Ethiopia, Yemen, Peru, India, Bangladesh and the Philippines. Shows how small technology community action solutions tackle the problem of sanitation and an adequate, clean water supply.
